content: प्रवासः ({%a%}) Going or journeying abroad, being absent from one's home, foreign residence; कुशः प्रवासस्थकलत्रवेषां (बनितामपश्यत्) <ls>R. 16. 4</ls>; <ls>Ś. 4. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 38</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 169</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 94.</ls> ({%b%}) A temporary sojourn; प्रवासादुपावृत्तेन काश्यपेनादिष्टोऽस्मि <ls>Ś. 4.</ls>
